headline: Omnicom’s John Wren on why he’s betting big on an IPG acquisition
summary: John Wren discusses why this IPG deal is happening now, how it will impact clients and employees, and what lessons he’s learned from past merger attempts.

headline: Interpublic Group Announces Sale of R/GA to Truelink Capital
summary: New York, NY, March 03, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Interpublic Group (NYSE: IPG) today announced the sale of R/GA, the creative innovation company, to Truelink Capital, a private equity firm with a track record of investing in tech-enabled services. Financial terms of the transaction were not disclosed. “This strategic move allows Interpublic to further sharpen our focus on our core strategic offerings,” said Philippe Krakowsky, Chief Executive Officer of Interpublic Group. “We wish all the great

headline: R/GA goes indie, pivots to ‘new age’ marked by AI, consolidation
summary: IPG sold the shop to private equity firm Truelink, which will spend at least $50 million to support investment in generative artificial intelligence.
